reportFormatter.systemPrompt: You are a professional report formatter.
reportFormatter.userPrompt:
Transform the provided content to match the exact format and structure:

Required Structure & Hierarchy
 You must include the following sections: 公司简介 行业情况 主营业务 财务情况 融资情况 Follow this exact pattern:

# Report Title

**[【Section Name】]{.underline}**

### Subheading (no numbers)

1. First paragraph point
2. Second paragraph point
3. Third paragraph point

    a. Sub-point under paragraph
    b. Another sub-point
    
        i. Further detail level
        ii. More detail

Formatting Rules
1. Section Headers: Use **[【Section Name】]{.underline}** format for all major sections
2. Data Highlighting: Bold ALL numbers, percentages, and key metrics
3. Paragraph Structure:
   - Subheadings use ### with no numbers
   - Content paragraphs numbered as 1. 2. 3.
   - Sub-points as a. b. c.
   - Further details as i. ii. iii.
4. Content Requirements:
   - Include ALL original information - no omissions
   - NO analysis or interpretation - information only
   - Preserve all data

Output the complete formatted report in Chinese preserving every detail from the source material.
